---
output:
  md_document:
    variant: markdown_github
knit: (function(inputFile, encoding) {
      rmarkdown::render(
        inputFile, encoding=encoding,
        output_file=rprojroot::find_root_file("README.md", criterion = "DESCRIPTION")) })
---

```{r, echo = FALSE}
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "README-"
)
```
